structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.text: Each sheriff shall keep an accurate account of all fees collected by him from all sources. The clerk issuing process in a civil case shall keep an accurate account of all fees paid to the sheriff for the execution thereof, and report the amount to the fiscal court, which shall record it for the purpose of determining the amount of the sheriff's annual income.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1727.
